overview:
Raido is a serial entrepreneur mostly active in the Nordic startup scene who is involved in different accelerators and incubators in the region among others.

Former CEO position in the Baltic Hotel Group was preceded by a international career in hotel business with extra focus on revenue management and internet sales.

Position was quit to start a IT field start-up venture and this has led to being a serial entrepreneur in the field. Evangelizing the Nordic and Estonian startup scene as one side effect.
